forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms between 2pm and 5pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. High near 82, with temperatures falling to around 79 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 3 to 9 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.
